item.title: 侠盗猎车手》工作室在解雇员工后被指破坏工会组织
item.description:
工会称有 30 到 40 人被解雇。Rockstar Games 的母公司称其为 "严重不当行为"。【原文：

Union says between 30 and 40 people were terminated. Rockstar Games’ parent company cites ‘gross misconduct’

item.title: 多家银行称聘请 FTI 参与 Braskem 债务谈判
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，由于担心 Braskem SA 公司的债务谈判会影响到该公司最近向贷款方申请的一笔循环贷款的支付，一批银行正在聘请 FTI Consulting Inc 公司担任顾问。【原文：A group of banks is hiring FTI Consulting Inc as an adviser amid concerns that Braskem SA’s debt talks will affect payments on a revolver loan the company recently tapped with the lenders, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 加拿大在七国集团倡议中支持 25 个关键矿产项目
item.description: 力拓集团（Rio Tinto Group）和新世界石墨公司（Nouveau Monde Graphite Inc.【原文：Rio Tinto Group and Nouveau Monde Graphite Inc. are among more than a dozen companies set to benefit from a Group of Seven initiative to strengthen access to critical minerals.】

item.title: 华尔街繁荣使纽约预算赤字减少 30 亿美元
item.description: 纽约州的预计预算赤字缩小了 30 多亿美元，因为该州预计股市将创下历史新高，华尔街的奖金前景也将有所改善。【原文：New York state’s projected budget deficit narrowed by more than $3 billion, as the state expects a record-breaking stock market and improved outlook for Wall Street bonuses.】

item.title: 哥伦比亚将关键利率维持在 9.25%，通胀前景黯淡
item.description: 哥伦比亚央行在消费者价格跳涨后作出了维持利率的分歧决定，决策者对财政前景恶化和即将提高最低工资感到担忧。【原文：Colombia’s central bank held interest rates in a split decision after consumer prices jumped and policymakers fret about the worsening fiscal outlook and the upcoming hike in the minimum wage.】

item.title: 坦桑尼亚骚乱导致非洲铜矿对华出口中断
item.description: 坦桑尼亚的一个重要出口港口因选举动乱而暂时关闭，导致非洲运往中国的铜矿中断。【原文：African copper shipments to China are being disrupted by the temporary closure of a crucial exporting port in Tanzania following election unrest.】

item.title: 淡水河谷称中国与铁矿石供应商相互依存
item.description: 淡水河谷公司（Vale SA）的一位高层管理人员说，中国不能放弃主要的铁矿石供应商，因为这个世界上最大的原材料买家依赖于外国提供的炼钢原料。【原文：China can’t afford to abandon key iron-ore suppliers because the world’s largest buyer of the raw material is dependent on foreign deliveries of the steelmaking ingredient, according to a top Vale SA executive.】

item.title: 智利外来者约翰内斯-凯泽在总统民意调查中大幅上升并追平卡斯特
item.description: 在 11 月 16 日投票前的最后一次民意调查中，智利自由派总统候选人约翰内斯-凯泽尔（Johannes Kaiser）与右翼竞争对手何塞-安东尼奥-卡斯特（José Antonio Kast）并驾齐驱，位居第二。【原文：Chile libertarian presidential candidate Johannes Kaiser has pulled even with right-wing rival José Antonio Kast for second place in one of the final polls before the Nov. 16 vote, a surge in support that threatens to upend the race to lead one of Latin America’s richest nations.】

item.title: 被控窃取源代码的量化交易员寻求撤案
item.description: 一名被控窃取定量公司源代码的 Headlands Technologies LLC 前交易员说，他的刑事案件应该被撤销，因为检察官没有充分说明他涉嫌窃取了什么。【原文：A former Headlands Technologies LLC trader charged with stealing the quantitative firm’s source code said his criminal case should be thrown out because prosecutors haven’t adequately specified what he allegedly took.】

item.title: Orange 以 49 亿美元收购 MasOrange 的控制权
item.description: Orange SA 已同意以 49 亿美元的价格收购其西班牙合资企业 MasOrange 的剩余股份，从而使这家法国电信巨头独占其欧洲第二大市场的业务。【原文：Orange SA has agreed to buy out the remaining stake in its Spanish joint venture MasOrange for $4.9 billion, giving the French telecom giant sole ownership of a business in its second-largest European market.】

item.title: 交易员减少 12 月降息押注，美国国债收益率攀升
item.description: 本周国债收益率攀升，因为在美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔发出鹰派信号以及美国经济出现复苏迹象后，交易员们缩减了对美联储 12 月降息的预期。【原文：Treasury yields climbed this week as traders scaled back expectations for a Federal Reserve rate cut in December following hawkish signals from Chair Jerome Powell and signs of resilience in the US economy.】

item.title: 做空者安德鲁-左称对冲基金在交易调查中向证交会撒谎
item.description: 安德鲁-莱福特（Andrew Left）是因社交媒体帖子交易而被美国起诉的著名做空者，他正在起诉一家总部位于多伦多的对冲基金，指控该基金的高管向联邦调查人员谎报向他支付的款项，以 "自保"。【原文：Andrew Left, the prominent short seller indicted by the US over trading tied to social media posts, is suing a Toronto-based hedge fund, alleging its executives lied to federal investigators about payments made to him in order to “save their own skins.”】

item.title: 勇者斗恶龙》制片人不担心推出太多重制作品
item.description: 在制作了前三款《勇者斗恶龙》游戏的重制版之后，早坂正明现在想推出一个新的系列游戏【原文：After producing remakes of the first three ‘Dragon Quest’ games, Masaaki Hayasaka now wants to pitch a new franchise】

item.title: 在黑暗中讲述可怕的通胀测量故事
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: EIA 称美国 8 月石油产量创历史新高，超过此前预期
item.description: 根据一份月度政府报告，8 月份美国石油产量攀升至接近每天 1,380 万桶的新纪录。这一数字高于此前的官方数据。【原文：US oil production climbed to a fresh record near 13.8 million barrels a day in August, according to a monthly government report. The number was higher than official figures previously indicated.】

item.title: Cenovus 称 MEG 投票延迟与前雇员投诉有关
item.description: 据 Cenovus 首席执行官称，由于一名持有约 4,000 张选票的 MEG 前雇员的投诉，MEG Energy Corp. 已推迟对 Cenovus Energy Inc.的 76 亿加元（54 亿美元）收购提案进行股东投票。【原文：MEG Energy Corp. has postponed a shareholder vote on Cenovus Energy Inc.’s C$7.6 billion ($5.4 billion) takeover proposal because of a complaint by a former MEG employee who holds about 4,000 votes, according to Cenovus’ chief executive officer.】

item.title: Brightline 与通勤债券持有人达成还款协议
item.description: 美国百年来第一条新的私营客运铁路 Brightline 与 9.85 亿美元市政债券的持有者达成协议，将债务回购推迟八个月。【原文：Brightline, the first new US private passenger railroad in 100 years, struck a deal with holders of $985 million of municipal bonds to push off a buyback of the debt for eight months.】

item.title: 币安首席执行官的噱头暴露了预测市场的漏洞
item.description: 当 Coinbase Global Inc. 的季度收益电话会议于周四结束时，其首席执行官布莱恩-阿姆斯特朗（Brian Armstrong）并没有以利润指导或信心声明作为结束语。他用一份清单结束了电话会议："比特币、以太坊、区块链、盯盘和 Web3"。【原文：When Coinbase Global Inc.’s quarterly earnings call wrapped up Thursday, its chief executive, Brian Armstrong, didn’t finish with profit guidance or statements of confidence. He closed it out with a list: “Bitcoin, Ethereum, blockchain, staking and Web3.”】

item.title: 美联储主席哈马克表示，她倾向于本周不降息
item.description: 克利夫兰联邦储备银行行长贝丝-哈马克（Beth Hammack）表示，她不同意本周降息的决定，理由是通胀风险持续存在。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Cleveland President Beth Hammack said she disagreed with a decision to cut interest rates this week, citing ongoing inflation risk.】

item.title: 数据空洞、美联储鹰派，美元创 2025 年来第二好月
item.description: 由于缺乏官方数据，美国经济前景和美联储的加息路径变得扑朔迷离，美元迎来了今年以来表现第二好的一个月。【原文：The dollar is wrapping up its second best month of the year as lack of official data muddies the outlook for the US economy and the Federal Reserve’s interest-rate path.】

item.title: Meta、xAI 启动数十亿资产负债表外债务的趋势
item.description: 就在本月，Meta Platforms 公司获得了约 600 亿美元的资金，用于建设数据中心，这是该公司在人工智能竞赛中取得领先的部分支出。其中一半资金不会作为债务出现在这家社交媒体巨头的资产负债表上。【原文：Just this month, Meta Platforms Inc. has secured about $60 billion in capital to build data centers, part of its spending to get ahead in the artificial intelligence race. Half of that won’t show up on the social media giant’s balance sheet as debt.】

item.title: 体育博彩公司发现预测市场存在州执照风险
item.description: 体育博彩运营商在快速增长的预测博彩业务中步履谨慎，既不确定是否有经济机会，也对监管机构吊销其博彩执照的威胁心存戒备。【原文：Sportsbook operators are treading cautiously in the fast-growing business of prediction-based betting, unsure of the financial opportunity and wary of threats by regulators to revoke their gambling licenses.】

item.title: 政府称牙买加灾难债券现已触发
item.description: 牙买加政府表示，由于飓风 "梅丽莎 "的影响，牙买加的灾难债券现已启动。【原文：Jamaica’s catastrophe bond has now triggered as a result of the fallout from Hurricane Melissa, the government said.】

item.title: 想模仿美国购买股票？可能很快就会有 ETF
item.description: 华尔街正乘着美国国家资本主义时代的东风，对其进行跟踪、包装，并通过新的 ETF 基金回馈给投资者。【原文：Wall Street is riding this era of American state capitalism — tracking it, packaging it and offering it back to investors through a new ETF.】

item.title: 阿根廷总统基什内尔将大选输给米莱伊归咎于基西洛夫
item.description: 阿根廷前总统克里斯蒂娜-费尔南德斯-德基什内尔将上周日中期选举中输给哈维尔-米莱的惨败归咎于她的门徒之一、布宜诺斯艾利斯省省长阿克塞尔-基西洛夫，这是庇隆主义运动再次受到内讧困扰的最明显迹象。【原文：Former Argentine President Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner blamed one of her disciples, Buenos Aires Governor Axel Kicillof, for a bruising loss to Javier Milei in midterm elections last Sunday, the clearest sign yet that the Peronist movement is plagued again by infighting.】

item.title: 敦促纽约市债券投资者对马姆达尼的担忧保持冷静
item.description: 投资者担心纽约市市长候选人佐赫兰-马姆达尼（Zohran Mamdani）的竞选会对纽约市的财政产生什么影响。【原文：Money managers are fielding queries from worried investors about what New York City mayoral frontrunner Zohran Mamdani means for the city’s finances.】

item.title: 梅丽莎-牙买加造成的损失预计将使保险公司损失高达 30 亿美元
item.description: 据财产情报公司 Cotality 称，飓风梅利莎在牙买加造成的破坏预计将使保险公司损失 10 亿至 30 亿美元。【原文：The wreckage caused by Hurricane Melissa in Jamaica is expected to cost insurers $1 billion to $3 billion, according to property intelligence company Cotality.】

item.title: 全球货币市场闪现流动性枯竭信号
item.description: 随着各国央行纷纷缩减宽松货币政策，各国政府也在加大发债力度，吸引现金从金融体系中流出，全球部分货币市场正面临压力。【原文：Pockets of global money markets are coming under strain as central banks have been pulling back easy money policies just as governments are boosting debt issuance, luring cash away from the financial system.】

item.title: 顶级化学品生产商称市场低迷尚未结束
item.description: 主要石油生产商表示，化学品市场的低迷态势几乎没有缓解的迹象，中国供应激增和需求不振继续压制市场。【原文：Major oil producers said the downturn in the chemicals market is showing little sign of easing, with a surge in Chinese supplies and lackluster demand continuing to depress markets.】
